name: SUN SHOWER (Komitsu)
description:
Walk along in the small balcony and say hello to 10 snails.

**
The balcony of my house is small, and there’re many flower pots and many snails. I spend more time at home these days, so I’m watching them every day.

**
↑↓→←: walk around
space: Say "Woo-hoo!"

**
This is my first flatgame.
many thanks to: https://flatgame.itch.io/first-timers-tutorial
I made music by blowing the ocarina in the Animal Crossing New Horizons.
